entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon then southwest 60 gusting to 100 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
